description.text: Study saathi is an educational platform built for B.Tech, Nursing, Diploma, ITI and Paramedical students. It provides access to Previous Year Question Papers (PYQs), Syllabus, Results, and Top College.

join_description.text: If you are interested in contributing to this project (design, development, or content), feel free to message me directly on LinkedIn.

linkedin_text.text: Tap here to join via LinkedIn
